title: Iron Man 2008 (Portable)
description:
Iron Man 2008 (Portable)



Iron Man 2008 | Size: 160 MB
DESCRIPTION :
Iron Man, one of Marvel&#039;s most indestructible Super Heroes, blast onto videogame platforms with this adaptation of the big screen movie. This third-person action game immerses players in the world of Tony Stark -- the brilliant industrialist and inventor who both created and became the world&#039;s toughest hero - Iron Man. By customizing the advanced technology in Iron Man&#039;s suits, gamers can take advantage of a wide array of high-impact weapons to strategically blow-up and destroy any enemy force and fight to rid the world of weapons of mass destruction.
MINIMUM SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS :
* OS: Windows 2000/XP/Vista
* Processor: Pentium 4 @ 1.4 GHz or Equivalent
* Memory: 512 MB
* Video Memory: 256 MB
Recommended system requirements:
* OS: Windows XP or Vista
* Processor: 2.6 + GHz Intel or 2.4 + GHz AMD
* Memory: 2 GB RAM
* Video Card: NVIDIA GeForce 7900 GTX or higher; ATI X1800 XL series or higher
* Hard Drive Space: 12 GB
* Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card and drivers - 5.1 sound card recommended


-----------------------------------------------------------------
Known issues:
-----------------------------------------------------------------
> wav2raw.exe is seen as an exploit by chatty antivirus softwares
although it is a command line audio decompressor. This file
is an essential tool and the sound in the game will not work
if this tool does not extract the sound files correctly.
This file doesnGÃƒÂ¯Ã‚Â¿Ã‚Â½ÃƒÂ¯Ã‚Â¿Ã‚Â½t harm your PC in any way.
I have scanned my whole PC with AVG and Kaspersky before and
after (not during) extracting these files, and there was no
sign of threat.

> Takes painfully long with Kaspersky Internet Security (KIS)
running as opposed to Norton 360. I think KIS scans each and
every file before execution.

> At this moment, the known trouble maker is Kaspersky. Neither
AVG nor Norton see wav2raw.exe as a threat.

> If you are too paranoid, possible way to extract this game,
keeping peace of mind, would be to disconnect from the internet,
disable Kaspersky or similar chatty antivirus softwares,
install the game, scan PC with your favorite antivirus software,
resume everything.
